summary: The feature request proposes renaming the `/cluster-info` API endpoint to `/cluster` for consistency with API design patterns. This aligns the self-hosted only endpoint with the naming convention used for other root endpoints like `/namespaces` and `/system-info`.
userImpact: Users calling the cluster info endpoint will need to update their code to use the new `/cluster` path instead of `/cluster-info`.
proposedFix: Rename the GetClusterInfo endpoint from `/cluster-info` to `/cluster`
resolutionDetails: The endpoint was renamed from `/cluster-info` to `/cluster` as part of API consolidation
